text: Bityo, ibyo abe ari byo uhamagarira (abantu), kandi ukomeze utungane nkâ€™uko wabitegetswe, ntuzanakurikire irari ryabo. Uvuge uti "Nemera ibyo Allah yahishuye mu bitabo (byahawe intumwa), kandi nategetswe gukoresha ubutabera muri mwe. Allah ni we Nyagasani wacu akaba ari na we Nyagasani wanyu. Dufite ibikorwa byacu namwe mukagira ibyanyu. Nta mpaka zikwiye kuba hagati yacu na mwe. Allah azaduhuriza hamwe twese (aducire imanza). Kandi iwe ni ho garukiro (ryacu twese)
